---
title: "In-class_Ex04a"
author: "Mohamad Hafez Sidek"
date: "April 13, 2024"
date-modified: "last-modified"
execute:
  eval: true
  echo: true
  warning: false
  freeze: true
  message: false
---


**Installing R Packages**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(ggstatsplot, tidyverse)
```
:::


**Loading Data**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam <- read.csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
:::


One-sample test: gghistostats() method

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)

gghistostats(
  data = exam,
  x = ENGLISH,
  type = "bayes",
  test.value = 60,
  xlab = "English scores"
)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

Two-sample mean test: ggbetweenstats()

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggbetweenstats(
  data = exam,
  x = GENDER, 
  y = MATHS,
  type = "np",
  messages = FALSE
)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Oneway ANOVA Test: ggbetweenstats() method

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggbetweenstats(
  data = exam,
  x = RACE, 
  y = ENGLISH,
  type = "p",
  mean.ci = TRUE, 
  pairwise.comparisons = TRUE, 
  pairwise.display = "s",
  p.adjust.method = "fdr",
  messages = FALSE
)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Significant Test of Correlation: ggscatterstats()

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggscatterstats(
  data = exam,
  x = MATHS,
  y = ENGLISH,
  marginal = FALSE,
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Significant Test of Association (Depedence) : ggbarstats() methods

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam1 <- exam %>% 
  mutate(MATHS_bins = 
           cut(MATHS, 
               breaks = c(0,60,75,85,100))
)
```
:::


Using ggbarstats()

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggbarstats(exam1, 
           x = MATHS_bins, 
           y = GENDER)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Installing R Packages

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(readxl, performance, parameters, see)
```
:::


Loading Data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
car_resale <- read_xls("data/ToyotaCorolla.xls", 
                       "data")
car_resale
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 1,436 × 38
      Id Model    Price Age_08_04 Mfg_Month Mfg_Year     KM Quarterly_Tax Weight
   <dbl> <chr>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>  <dbl>         <dbl>  <dbl>
 1    81 TOYOTA … 18950        25         8     2002  20019           100   1180
 2     1 TOYOTA … 13500        23        10     2002  46986           210   1165
 3     2 TOYOTA … 13750        23        10     2002  72937           210   1165
 4     3  TOYOTA… 13950        24         9     2002  41711           210   1165
 5     4 TOYOTA … 14950        26         7     2002  48000           210   1165
 6     5 TOYOTA … 13750        30         3     2002  38500           210   1170
 7     6 TOYOTA … 12950        32         1     2002  61000           210   1170
 8     7  TOYOTA… 16900        27         6     2002  94612           210   1245
 9     8 TOYOTA … 18600        30         3     2002  75889           210   1245
10    44 TOYOTA … 16950        27         6     2002 110404           234   1255
# ℹ 1,426 more rows
# ℹ 29 more variables: Guarantee_Period <dbl>, HP_Bin <chr>, CC_bin <chr>,
#   Doors <dbl>, Gears <dbl>, Cylinders <dbl>, Fuel_Type <chr>, Color <chr>,
#   Met_Color <dbl>, Automatic <dbl>, Mfr_Guarantee <dbl>,
#   BOVAG_Guarantee <dbl>, ABS <dbl>, Airbag_1 <dbl>, Airbag_2 <dbl>,
#   Airco <dbl>, Automatic_airco <dbl>, Boardcomputer <dbl>, CD_Player <dbl>,
#   Central_Lock <dbl>, Powered_Windows <dbl>, Power_Steering <dbl>, …
```
:::
:::


Multiple Regression Model using lm()

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
model <- lm(Price ~ Age_08_04 + Mfg_Year + KM + 
              Weight + Guarantee_Period, data = car_resale)
model
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = Price ~ Age_08_04 + Mfg_Year + KM + Weight + Guarantee_Period, 
    data = car_resale)

Coefficients:
     (Intercept)         Age_08_04          Mfg_Year                KM  
      -2.637e+06        -1.409e+01         1.315e+03        -2.323e-02  
          Weight  Guarantee_Period  
       1.903e+01         2.770e+01  
```
:::
:::


Model Diagnostic: checking for multicolinearity:

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
check_c <- check_collinearity(model)
plot(check_c)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Model Diagnostic: checking normality assumption

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
model1 <- lm(Price ~ Age_08_04 + KM + 
              Weight + Guarantee_Period, data = car_resale)

check_n <- check_normality(model1)

plot(check_n)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Model Diagnostic: Check model for homogeneity of variances

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
check_h <- check_heteroscedasticity(model1)

plot(check_h)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Model Diagnostic: Complete check

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
check_model(model1)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Visualising Regression Parameters: see methods

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(parameters(model1))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Visualising Regression Parameters: ggcoefstats() methods

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggcoefstats(model1, 
            output = "plot")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex04a_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
